get.description: Retrieves the order detail for a unique system order id identifier (pkOrderId) For working with open orders recommended to use OpenOrders/GetOpenOrdersDetails Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ViewOrderDetailsNode

parameters.description: Orders to get packaging calculations for

Any existing notes should be retrieved using GetOrderNotes and added to this list, so that they are not lost/overwritten.

Retrieves the order detail for a given order numeric id. If not found empty class is returned. For working with open orders recommended to use OpenOrders/GetOpenOrdersDetails Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ViewOrderDetailsNode

ProcessedDateTime.description: Date and time when order was processed

FolderName.description: Folder names assigned to an order

PaidDateTime.description: Date and time when the order was marked as paid

Status.description: Order Status (0 = UNPAID, 1 = PAID,2 = RETURN,3 = PENDING,4 = RESEND)

IsRuleRun.description: If rules engine rule ran on an order

Marker.description: Order marker (0 = NOT TAG,1 = Tag 1,2 = Tag 2,3 = Tag 3,4 = Tag 4,5 = Tag 5,6 = Tag 6,7 = Parked)

SecondaryReference.description: An additional reference number for the orderr (Used by some channels)

ExternalReferenceNum.description: This is an additional reference number from the sales channel, typically used by eBay

ReceivedDate.description: The date and time at which the order was placed on the sales channel

SiteCode.description: SiteCode used to differentiate between different sites from a single channel (eg. Amazon UK, Amazon US, Amazon FR...)

HoldOrCancel.description: This shows whether the order has been marked as on hold, for processed orders if the order has been cancelled OnHold = 1

ScheduledDelivery.description: Scheduled delivery dates. Take priority over despatch by date

PostalServiceName.description: Postal service name (e.g. Next day delivery)

TrackingNumber.description: Order tracking number provided by courier

ManualAdjust.description: If there is an adjustment to shipping cost was made

TotalDiscount.description: Total discount applied to the order

ConversionRate.description: Currency conversion rate. Set at point of save by the currency

OnPurchaseOrder.description: Purchase order bound to this item

Tax.description: Actual tax value on an item

TaxCostInclusive.description: If tax is included in a cost

BinRacks.description: List of BinRacks used for OrderItem

InventoryTrackingType.description: Identifies whether the item has a sell by date or other defined order in which inventory is to be sold

NoteDate.description: Date and time when note was added

IdentifierId.description: Internal identifier id. Use to update image and name.

IsCustom.description: Is the tag user or system defined?

Name.description: Name displayed where the tag is used

BatchId.description: If the item is batched, identifies the batch number

OrderItemBatchId.description: If the item is batched, identifies the unique order item batch row

GetOrderPackagingCalculationRequest.description: Request class for GetOrderPackagingCalculationRequest method in Orders controller

pkOrderIds.description: List of order ids for which the packaging information should be returned, recalculated, saved

Recalculate.description: Flag to indicate that recalculation is necessary

SaveRecalculation.description: Flag to indicate that after recalculation the results should be saved back to the database

CalcOrderHeader.description: Class represents a single instance of an order and its header packaging information. Note that if the order contains split packaging fkPackagingTypeId will be Empty Guid

ItemWeight.description: Total Item weight in the order

fkPackagingTypeId.description: Calculated packaging type for the order

TotalWidth.description: Total width of the order packaging. If null the recalculation was not performed yet. See documentation about how the dimensions of the order calculated.

TotalHeight.description: Total Height of the order packaging. If null the recalculation was not performed yet. See documentation about how the dimensions of the order calculated.

TotalDepth.description: Total Depth of the order packaging. If null the recalculation was not performed yet. See documentation about how the dimensions of the order calculated.

ManualAdjust.description: Inidicates that order weights, packaging dimensions has been manually adjusted by the user and therefore automatic recalculation should not be performed for this order

IsAutoSplit.description: Was the packaging automatically split? Usually by the 3D Packaging method.

SplitPackageCount.description: Indicates the number of split packaging bins. If null, or 0 - no split packaging

CalculationHints.description: Calculation comments. The recalculation routine will output some basic comments about how the calculation was performed in English.

Items.description: List of order items (excluding composite parents)

CalcOrderItem.description: Class represents order item for package calculation purposes only

fkOrderItemId.description: Unique row identifier of the order item

fkCompositeParentRowId.description: Indicates whether the item is a child of a composite, if EmptyGuid or Null not a child

Weight.description: Bin total weight. If null, recalculation was not performed

Width.description: Bin width. If null, recalculation was not performed

Height.description: Bin height. If null, recalculation was not performed

Depth.description: Bin depth. If null, recalculation was not performed

PackagingWeight.description: Bin packaging weight. If null, recalculation was not performed

ItemWeight.description: Bin ItemWeight. If null, recalculation was not performed

ManualAdjust.description: Indicates that the bin weights and dimensions have been manually adjusted by the user

Items.description: List of order item ids in the bin and their quantities

CalcBinItem.description: Class represents order item in the bin

request.description: Request object with data to be saved in the database
Request object with data to be saved in the database

SetOrderPackagingRequest.description: Request class for SetOrderPackaging method in Orders controller

fkPackagingTypeId.description: Packaging Type Id. It has to be one of types available for selected Group Id

pkOrderId.description: Order Id to set the order packaging data

ManualAdjust.description: Indicate if this data is manually adjusted with the rest of fields or is auto calculated

IsAutoSplit.description: Indicates whether the order should be auto split. Usually via the 3D packaging methods.

InventoryTrackingType.description: 0 - None, 1 - Order by sell by date, 2 - Ordered by priority sequence

PickedQuantity.description: Indicate how many units are now allocated in open orders

InTransfer.description: Number of items in Transfer phase.

UseChannelTax.description: Validate if the tax should be overwritten on the order.

pkOrderId.description: Used when IsNew is false to update the order

AutomaticallyLinkBySKU.description: When the order is saved it will try and link by SKU after trying by channel sku mapping.

AutomaticallyLinkByBarcode.description: When the order is saved it will try and link by Barcode after trying by channel sku mapping.

AutomaticallyLinkByASIN.description: When the order is saved it will try and link by ASIN after trying by channel sku mapping.

Site.description: Used to determine the site of the order.

MatchPostalServiceTag.description: Match postal service method by name

PostalServiceName.description: Postal service name used for saving new postal services

SavePostalServiceIfNotExist.description: Determines wither or not to save postal service if it does not exist

PaymentMethodName.description: Payment method name used for saving new payment methods

SavePaymentMethodIfNotExist.description: Determines wither or not to save payment methods if it does not exist

MappingSource.description: Overrides the mapping source for the channel for example if the Source is 'AMAZON FBA' MappingSource can be used to override to 'AMAZON'

OrderState.description: State the order should be saved e.g. hold, parked, none

OrderStatusType.description: The status of the order on the channel

OrderStatus.description: The raw status text of the order on the channel

PaymentStatus.description:
Payment status of the order, eg Paid
If Unpaid ChannelOrderAdapter.Save() will ensure order is PARKED

Locations.description: The order location(s) on the channel

ExtendedProperties.description: List of extended properties for the order

Notes.description: List of notes for the order

ReferenceNumber.description: Reference number, should be the same as the one used for despatches

Currency.description: Currency of the order, if value is null, empty or white space it will default to UNK

ReceivedDate.description: UTC received date/time of the order

DispatchBy.description: UTC date/time the order should be despatched by

PaidOn.description: Date the order was paid for

PostalServiceCost.description: Postal service cost inclusive of tax after discount

PostalServiceTaxRate.description: Tax percent for the postal service cost, eg 20

PostalServiceDiscount.description: Discount percent for the postal service cost, this will not calculate down the postal service cost

Discount.description: This represents the final discount applied to the order, as a value (not a percentage), after all item-level discounts are applied. It will be split evenly across all order items

ItemsRefund.description: The refund amount applied across all items

ShippingRefund.description: The amount refunded for shipping (if known)

TotalRefund.description: The total refund amount applied to the order across all items, services and order-level refunds

LineRefundAllocation.description: The known refund allocation for the order lines

ShippingRefundAllocation.description: The known refund allocation for the order shipping

BuyerTaxNumber.description: The tax number of the buyer

DiscountType.description: This represents how the discount will be split between items and postage. For an expsanation of each opiton, see the enum documentation

DiscountTaxType.description: This represents if the discount is applied before or after tax

DeliveryStartDate.description: Channel specified delivery start date (do not set where is not provided)

DeliveryEndDate.description: Channel specified delivery end date (do not set where is not provided)

UseChannelTax.description: Validate if the tax should be overwritten on the order item.

TaxRate.description: Tax Rate as a whole number eg. 20

LineDiscount.description: Discount percentage on the line as a whole number eg. 10

LineRefund.description: The refund amount applied on the line, excluding shipping charges

RefundQuantity.description: The quantity of items refunded (can be decimalised)

ShippingRefund.description: The shipping refund for this line (if known)

TotalRefund.description: The total refund amount applied on the line-level, including any shipping charges

ChannelSKU.description: SKU of the item ordered on the channel

IsService.description: Indicates the item is a service and not a physical item

ItemTitle.description: Title of the item ordered, or service name

ExternalReference.description: The order location id on the channel.

ItemAllocations.description:
The item and quantity allocation.
Only required if order is multi-location.

Internal.description: Declares if the note is an internal note

isEmpty.description: Check if the address is empty.

request.description: Request with OrderId and BasicExtendedProperties as fields

OrderId.description: Order id of the order to append extended properties to

ExtendedProperties.description: Array of basic extended properties to be added

ExtendedPropertiesInserted.description: The number of extended properties that were added

Errors.description: An array of errors created when attempting to add

BatchAssignmentMode.description: The way in which batches should be assigned

fulfilmentCenter.description: Location to get the orders for

Order.description: Priority of sorting (e.g. sort by date first, then by status)

IsFilterOnly.description: Defines if the field can only be used as a filter

EntriesPerPage.description: Result page size, quantity of records per page

FolderName.description: Folder name of an order if any assigned

fulfilmentCenter.description: Location to get the orders for
Location to get the orders for

orderIds.description: List of orders to mark as label printed
List of orders to mark as label printed

OrderIds.description: A list of orders that should be assigned the IsPrinted value

BatchAssignmentMode.description: If stock batches needs to be assigned this defines how they should be assigned

orderIds.description: List of order IDs to run rules on

ruleId.description: Id of Rule to run. Null if all rules should be run

tag.description: new tag. null to remove the tag

orderIds.description: list of order ids to be assigned
list of order ids to be assigned

OrdersMoved.description: List of orders that were moved

KeyedErrors.description: Dictionary of keyed errors. These are the same errors as per the Errors property, but indexable by orderId

TrackingNumberRequired.description: If tracking number is required for this service

loadItems.description: Load or not the order items information

loadAdditionalInfo.description: Load or not the order additional info

loadItems.description: Load or not the orders items information

loadAdditionalInfo.description: Load or not the orders additional info

Date.description: Date and time when audit record was added

User.description: User who left an audit trail record

PricePerUnit.description: Price per unit (default from stock item)

orderItem.description: The order item to be updated

scanPerformed.description: Indicate if the scan has been performed

context.description: Information about where the call came from

Error.description: There was ab error during processing

orderId.description: Identifies the order to be updated

orderItemRowId.description: Identifies the order item row to assign to the batch

batchInventoryId.description: Identifies the batch for the order

quantity.description: The number of items to be assigned to the selected batch

context.description: Information about where the call came from

wasDraft.description: Indicate if the order was a draft before this operation

TrackingNumber.description: Order tracking number provided by courier

ManualAdjust.description: If there is an adjustment to shipping cost was made

saveToCrm.description: Whether to save the shipping address into CRM, default = false

OrderItemRowId.description: The Row Id for the order item

AdditionalInfo.description: A list of additional information to update or delete from the order item

initialQuantity.description: Initial quantity once the inventory item has been created

AssignedBatches.description: The batches that make up this row

Quantity.description: The quantity taken from the batch to fulfil this item

ProcessOrderByOrderIdOrReferenceRequest.description: A request used to process an order by id or reference

OrderOrReferenceId.description: The order id or reference id

LocationId.description: The location to process the order from

ScansPerformed.description: Defines if the batches have been scanned

OrderProcessingNotesAcknowledged.description: Have the processing notes been acknowledged

WorkflowJobId.description: Workflow job id that the order is supposed to belong to

ProcessOrderByOrderIdOrReferenceResponse.description: A response class used when processing an order by order id or reference

Message.description: A message - Provided if there have been errors

Response.description: A response object used if further action is required

OrderId.description: The ID of the order - Guid empty if not found

OrderSummary.description: Used when an order has been processed

Items.description: The items that need to be scanned - If any

ReceivedDate.description: Date when order was received on a channel

NumProducts.description: Quantity of products on an Order
